🎟️ Lucky Draw

We reward all users who contribute to the community, even for simple chatting.

✍️

CHAT to Lucky Draw

We reward users who actively participate in community discussions

  • Points Each Speech: 1 Point
  • Eligibility: Users with ≥ 300 Points
  • Lucky Draw: Weekly
👥

INVITE to Lucky Draw

We reward users who contributing for community growth

  • Eligibility: Users with ≥ 20 Invites
  • Lucky Draw: Weekly
📈

QUIZ to Lucky Draw

We reward users who contributing for best understanding of the group rules

  • Eligibility: Users who sending correct answer to all questions
  • Lucky Draw: Weekly

🪙 $E2P Token

The $E2P token served as governance token of E2P Club. The $E2P token will be rewarded those who contribute to E2P Club growth. The ultimate goal of E2P Club is to gather high-quality investors and form a powerful crypto investors base with over 50,000 members.

Token Distribution

  • 60% of the $E2P token will be distributed to the E2P Club members
  • E2P Club Members can earn $E2P token by completing tasks

Ways to Earn $E2P

Join E2P DAO VIP Group:100,000 $E2P
Invite Users to E2P DAO VIP Group:100,000 $E2P Per User
Register OKX by Ref Link and Trade:25,000 $E2P for every $5,000 volume
Recommend Projects for Cooperation:10,000 $E2P Per Project
Increase Engagement of Social Media:500 $E2P Per Time
